description:
The Birds app contains identification guides on 167 of the most common birds found in the UK.  It will help all nature lovers identify birds whilst out and about.  It also gives you the ability to store your sitings and store information about these sitings.

The app contains detailed information on each bird and a gallery of high quality photos for each bird listed.

The app has the following features:
- 167 of the most commonly seen birds of the UK, with more added all the time

- 820 photos to accompany these birds and 82 songs/calls.

- A to Z list of birds

- Family screen where by the birds are split down into families

- Favorites screen where you can store your favorite birds

- Search screen where you can search by either common or latin name

- Detailed information on each bird listed 

- Many pictures for each bird listed, helping with the identification process

- Recordings of calls and songs of birds

- Fast and simple to use

- Ability to log when you have spotted a bird

- Spotted screen which shows info on all your spottings

- Ability to save information about all the birds you have spotted, such as place, date of spotting and accompanying notes.

Currently the app contains 167 of the most common UK birds but we will be updating it in the coming weeks to have more.

If there is a bird that you think we have missed and you would like to see it listed, then please drop us an email at support@clevermatrix.co.uk and we'll see what we can do.

Coming soon: 
- Identification screen, enabling you to select certain characteristics and the bird is identified for you

- Cool social networking feature where you can share your spottings, notes, tips and photos with other users of the app

- Mapping info to show where you made your sightings.
